import DataObject from '@cerner/terra-graphs-docs/lib/example-datasets/dataObjects/General/noDataView.js?dev-site-codeblock';
require('details-polyfill');

# Graph with no data

This is simple graph with no data in it.

## Getting Started

- Install with [npmjs](https://www.npmjs.com):
  - `npm i @cerner/carbon-graphs --save-dev`

## Usage
```js
import Carbon from '@cerner/carbon-graphs';
import '@cerner/carbon-graphs/dist/css/carbon-graphs.css';
```

## Example
<LineGraph />

<details>
<summary style={{fontSize: 24 }}>
<b>Data</b>
</summary>

### Graph Config object
<GraphConfig />

### Data object
<DataObject />
</details>
